ygData.subject: still here
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh. I m still here...although my computer monitor at home blew up on me so I ve been in virtual EQ blackout for a couple weeks now.  *sob*  So tell me some
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh. I'm still here...although my computer monitor at home blew up on me
so I've been in virtual EQ blackout for a couple weeks now. *sob* So tell
me some of your adventures folks...so I can feel like I'm still playing. :)

Here's another thing I've been wondering too before I was rudely cut from my
EQ addiction...where are other areas you'd recommend for a 23-25level
Wizard? I've been drifting between Najena and SKaranas for a while now and
I'm getting bored. Unrest is hopeless for me because the lag is
intolerable. I heard Cazic is good, but it seems we're relatively unwanted
there till we are about level 27+ or so. Any advice?

-- Lim'Dul

>Ho guys are you stil alive? :)
Two months ago it was 2 digest per day and now heu ONE message per day >:)
Everyone is on hollyday or everyone now play another race/classes ? >(there
are less wizzard right now :( )

>WAKE UP ALL WE ARE STILL ALIVE !:) heu i hope so :)
